reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan cute and well-made, with one noting it resembles a granny square poncho, and they appreciate its soft material and fantabulous texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: I love this cardi! Very boho, reminiscent of a 70s vibe. Cream with pretty colors that allow you to pair with different color tanks or camisoles to coordinate with jewelry. Good with shorts, jeans, leggings. Open weave, which gives a light cover in warm temps, but this could be worn year round if you wanted to pair with a slim turtleneck. Length is good, hits just below the waist, so it can conceal muffins top but is not so long that it looks matronly. The knit was well done and had no flaws. Grab one and pair with a trendy hat. Got lots of compliments! Read more
items.author: Diva

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as pictured! Darling sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! It takes me back to the 70s and it’s exactly as pictured. The colors are bright and it is so lightweight which was what I wanted. It is very true to size and extremely soft. The sweater is very well-made and so many colors to choose from to wear a little tea shirt underneath. I get many compliments. Read more
items.author: Linda K Estes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Marcia Brady Would Wear This!
items.body: This cardigan is so cute and such a unique piece. I got the green which looks exactly like the picture and I’m in love with this color. Best with jeans or all white or all black imo. I’m kind of a cotton snob and hate other materials so I was surprised at how soft and almost cotton- like this material felt. Don’t know what the people who mention scratchy material are talking about, unless there is inconsistency in the manufacturing and some colors or items are made with a different material than the one I received??? The sleeves are definitely long but it kind of adds to the grooviness and gives a bell sleeve vibe. I do have long arms though. The length is perfect, at hips. Everything today seems to be either cropped or way too long. I thought the back was maybe shorter but I gave it a slight tug and it looked perfect. The overall fit was great. The Xxl was perfect for me at 5’5, 195 lbs with very large bust( 46G). I have not washed it and don’t recall the washing instructions so can’t speak to that. I definitely recommend this sweater. Perfect for a spring day or summer night. Extra points for fun factor! Read more
items.author: K.L.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kinda Groovy and Cool
items.body: I liked this. I'm 5'8" and it wasn't too cropped - it hit just below my waist. It's a great sweater to wear with jeans because it gives the outfit color without being too much. It's a very open weave as shown. I kept it because it was different than anything else I own - cute and boho for sure. The only drawback is that the colors in it for some reason don't go with anything else I own, eventhough I thought they would because there are so many of them. And it's overall not a cream, not a white, just a kinda weird beigy yellowy thing. And the other colors are a certain tone/muted that I'm finding hard to match which was a surprise. But I am going to just take it with me to a store and find a tank to wear under it that matches one of the colors. Oh, it comes out of the package kinda funky and you first think...what?...but then if you put it on it relaxes and then looks like the picture. I would say that it's as cute in person as in the picture and has the exact same vibe. Would be cute in the summer over shorts or a short jeans skirt and sandals but it's winter now so I'm wearing it with jeans and Birkenstocks. Read more
items.author: KellyShops

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful!!! Very well made. I get compliments every time I wear it. Even though it’s crocheted, it’s comfortable and not itchy. True to size although the sleeves are a little long. Very lightweight. Great for Fall and Spring. Recommend! Read more
items.author: Erica W.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars sleeves too long
items.body: would have been super cute but sleeves are entirely way too long. precious colors, quality was really good, i so wished the sleeves hadn't been too long Read more
items.author: Pam Logan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and versatile!
items.body: This is the first thing I have ever bought that an influencer had on their Instagram. I love this sweater! It goes with almost every T-shirt in my closet and dresses up the outfit just enough that I’m feeling a little more pretty. You have to be careful wearing it because it will catch on things like drawer pulls though. It’s also a nice lightweight cover to help if you tend to get a little chilly in restaurants or at the movies. I live in southern Texas, so it never really gets that cold down here but it will help keep me warm when it’s 60° out. As for the size? I am 5‘6“ tall and I weigh 160 pounds. My bra size is 36DDD. Amazon recommended a size large so I ordered that. Yes, the sleeves are long, but that is the style of the sweater. I’m also 57 years old and I’m not trying to look like someone in their 20s, so I ordered a medium for size comparison. I’m keeping the medium. It fits my arms a little bit better and there just isn’t a significant difference in the overall sizing (other than a bit in the arms) for me. I have not washed it, but I think it will lay a little better once I do. I will wash it in a bra bag and I won’t dry it the first time. Hopefully it washes well. I really don’t hand wash anything in my wardrobe and usually it’s fine as long as I protect it and I use a gentle detergent. Read more
items.author: Robin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun look for a fab price
items.body: Colors and knit as pictured. Soft fabric. Size is accurate. Great price for a quality item. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, White, Blue, Olive Green, Apricot, Black, Light Yellow, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
